lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency was told it needed to restore its reputation as the war of words over the timing of its response to the Russian doping scandal escalated on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: WADA in the Crosshairs, as IOC Members Fume at Late Response
headline.main: WADA in the Crosshairs, as IOC Members Fume at Late Response

snippet: The World Anti-Doping Agency was told it needed to restore its reputation as the war of words over the timing of its response to the Russian doping scandal escalated on Tuesday....
